channel.title: When characters walk in the sea....?
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape readers & helpers,
I am currently having problems with a bug, with this bug sometimes you see someone walking where they are actually not, Eg. one of my players were walking into the sea, so i logged out and in, just incase it was a bug you could fix by doing that. When i logged back in the player walked back into the sea, then my other admin witnessed it, i know this is a bug as it happened to me aswell, once.
Does anyone know how to fix this visual bug?
-- Thank you for taking the time to read my help topic --

item.title: When characters walk in the sea....?
item.dc:creator: @Proview Proview
item.description:
@Proview wrote:

This isn’t my problem.

I fixed noclip, i made a command.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("noclip")) {
disconnected = true;
}

That works, so it’s not noclip, it’s not when they teleport, this is a visual bug.

Some people know of this bug, so does anyone know a solution to it?

Ps. My source is P16 (Project16)

– Any help? –

Read full topic
item.source: When characters walk in the sea....?

item.title: When characters walk in the sea....?
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

It’s when they teleport somewhere and click straight into the sea or if they teleport then walk then teleport and walk without there being a loading please wait,
